title: Interpretation of a dream about a falling tooth in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: The dream of falling fangs is considered one of the most surprising and terrifying dreams for the dreamer, but there are several interpretations related to this dream, and through this article we will list all the interpretations related to this dream by citing the opinions of various scholars. On its interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a tusk falling out in a dream. Seeing a tusk falling out or falling out in a dream has a different interpretation if it is from the upper layer of teeth than if it is from the lower layer of teeth. In general, teeth in a dream indicate what life contains in terms of money, debts, or means of livelihood. Good or bad. A dream about teeth falling out without bleeding symbolizes the dreamer’s long life, but pulling teeth with bleeding indicates zakat on money. However, if the dreamer is a girl, then the interpretation of this dream is her reaching puberty and transitioning to a new era. As for the one who dreams that his teeth fell out and are rotten, then This dream is interpreted as a good condition for this fortune teller, but if it falls into his hand, then his dream indicates the providence of God (Glory be to Him). To him. Seeing teeth falling out in a dream symbolizes the long life of the pioneer, and if the dreamer dreams that his teeth fell on his sleeve or lap, then the meaning of the dream is that he will live until his teeth fall out and the number of his family grows. As for the one who dreams that all his teeth have fallen out, he does not see them in the dream. This means the death of all his family in front of him. O dreamer, God gives him money, and it may symbolize a male child, but falling to the ground means death. As for the falling of the lower teeth in the dream, it symbolizes anxiety and sadness, but if the dreamer is in debt, then this dream promises him the repayment of his debt. You are confused about your matter and do not find an explanation. reassures you? Search on Google for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website. Interpretation of seeing a tusk falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned several positive and negative interpretations of this vision: First, the positive interpretations: Whoever dreams that a tusk has been extracted from his upper teeth and that this tusk has fallen into his lap, then he will have a male child. Seeing teeth falling out in a dream symbolizes paying off debts. Whoever dreams of falling out for only one year, then this dream is good news for paying off his debts in one go. Whoever dreams that his upper teeth are falling out, his dream symbolizes that a lot of money will come to him. Whoever sees in In a dream that he extracted a molar and this tooth fell into his hand, then the dream indicates that this dreamer is reconciling with one of his rivals among his relatives. Second, negative interpretations: Whoever dreams that he extracted a molar from the upper layer of his teeth and this tooth fell to the ground, then this dream indicates the dreamer’s death. Whoever saw In a dream, all his teeth have fallen to the ground. This dream may symbolize the death of his family before him, or it may symbolize their exposure to adversity and worries, or their exposure to diseases. Whoever dreams that his teeth fall out and then collects them in his hand, his dream may indicate the death of one of his children. If a person dreams that his teeth are falling out and he cannot eat in his dream, then this dream symbolizes his exposure to poverty. A tusk falling out in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about teeth falling out by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says: Whoever dreams that his teeth fell out, and finds them after they fell out, the meaning of his dream is an increase in his lifespan. As for Who fell

title: Interpretation of a dream about drinking water, thirst and water in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of drinking a lot of water and not being satisfied with being single, according to Ibn Sirin from the bottle that dreamed of drinking water. Interpretation of drinking water in a dream. Water is often good, as long as it is clear or drinkable. Whoever drank from a well of pure water, or drank from it, and did not find the end of the well, and the water from the well does not It runs out in his sleep. Whoever is single, whether a girl or a young man, will get married if he wants to drink it, or it will be quenched with pleasure after thirst. If the dream concerns a married man or a married woman, and if he is not yet married to his wife or desires to be, he will meet him and get Whatever he wants. If he is married or in a quarrel with his partner, then this is an intimate and affectionate relationship. Whoever violates all of the above is a sinner or an infidel who will enter Islam or atone for his sin. If he is a knowledgeable person, then he has acquired great knowledge, and if he is a merchant, then he has made a profit. It is lawful and good in its case. If a female or male dreams that the water is not pure and that it is contaminated with it changing its color or taste, this indicates a forbidden act or sin on the part of the dreamer. If the monarch drinks from a male or female, whether she is a girl, married, or pregnant Then he drinks from a house where he knows of the betrayal of its owner, or drinks from a Christian house, as he enjoys great charisma, corrupt deeds, and forbidden relationships. Such as intercourse, adultery, union, or mingling. Whoever drinks pure water that is not contaminated with any contaminant in its color or taste, and it comes from its source, such as a well or a drinking basin on the street or in his home, he will attain goodness and joy in quantity. A drink. Enjoying water means marriage, a wife, or married life. As for turbid water, it is not suitable in all its circumstances unless it becomes clear afterward. Whoever drinks pure water or sees pure water from a river, heavy rain, or a full well and drinks from one of them, he will be safe. If Chewing on water in his mouth, or feeling the movement of water in his mouth, or washing his mouth, this indicates the difficulty of the dreamer’s life and that it will change for the better. It has been said that the safety of enemies, opponents, and machinations. Whoever drinks water in very large quantities and the water is pure indicates the longevity of the dreamer. It is said: If he drinks water After being thirsty or quenched, or given to someone, an animal or a plant to drink, he will obtain goodness for himself or a happy marriage for the unmarried and unmarried, and money and happiness for the married. Or comfort in life, which is security and joy for the pregnant woman. Whoever drinks from absolute water, such as a river or a well, or water on a road that no one owns, or heavy rain that fills his power, the dreamer will attain a good life, goodness, benefit, and contentment. If the water is turbid or If it is polluted or has an unpleasant smell, then the opposite happens in the life of the fortuneteller. Whoever drinks water from a person's house, if it is by the will of the owner of the house or the owner of the water, then he will benefit from a close person or someone close to someone who is a relative of the owner of the water. . If it was without the permission of the owner of the water, or he drank by stealing water, or water owned by someone he does not know, then he will lose money while drinking it, or he will reap sadness and distress. He also drinks it, or needs to do good deeds and submit to God for his previous disobedience in order to atone for his sins. Whoever sees in a dream clean water and it is abundant in an area where justice prevails

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the letter “Kha” in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the letter Kh in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq The letter Kha contains many symbols and concepts that have important symbols, and many people want to know the interpretations related to it, the most important of which is the vision according to what was said about the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq, rings, circumcision, vinegar and pregnancy. And many other symbols whose interpretation we will explain in our topic today according to what was interpreted by Imam Al-Sadiq. See also: Seeing pins in a dream Interpretation of the letter Kha in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq Interpretation of the letter Kha in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq Interpretation of seeing a dream with the letter “Kha” for a married woman has multiple meanings and interpretations, His interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq was as follows:Rubbles appear in dreams, disasters and losses. Dementia and infection in dreams indicate the spread of damage. Wood in a dream is a symbol of hypocrisy. Repentance in a dream is good news because it is a sign of sincere and sincere repentance. If there is no bat attack, This is a sign of security and stability, which indicates the good, safety and security of his life. Succession in a dream is one of the signs that indicate an improvement in the situation and the disappearance of worries, problems and pleasant events. A dagger in a dream is a symbol of money and wealth and a symbol of a close marriage. The groove is also one of the symbols of security. Beetles are A sign of bad morals and ethics. The tent is one of short trips and good news in a person’s life, and God knows best. See also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream. Interpretation of the letter Kha in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about the letter Kha for an unmarried woman has multiple connotations and interpretations, and Imam al-Sadiq interpreted it as follows: Seeing the letter kha in a dream or seeing a ring in a dream indicates the birth of a child if the ring is made of gold. Seeing a broken ring may not be a good omen because it may indicate the divorce of a married woman or an indication of the death of the fetus. Seeing a pregnant sheep in a dream indicates the birth of a boy. Seeing cucumbers in a dream means stress and sadness. Seeing peaches in a dream indicates dreams and ambitions. Seeing peaches in a dream can indicate a trip and many good things. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the letter “Kha” for a pregnant woman in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dream with the letter “Kha” “Kha” for a pregnant woman has multiple meanings and interpretations, and his interpretation according to Imam Al-Sadiq was as follows: The ring is one of the most common symbols in dreams and has many meanings such as prestige and power. A woman who wears a golden ring in a dream symbolizes the birth of a boy. Wearing a silver ring indicates the birth of a woman. Seeing the loss of a ring is a great loss for the pioneer. Breaking a ring in a dream is a harbinger of escape and separation between close friends and married people. The dreamer who received the ring as a gift, shows marriage in a dream for an unmarried woman. Signs of imminent labor for pregnant women. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of the appearance The letter Kha for a man according to Imam Al-Sadiq. The interpretation of seeing a dream with the letter “Kha” for a man has multiple meanings and interpretations, and his interpretation by Imam Al-Sadiq was as follows: Seeing seals in dreams is one of many interpretations and signs.

title: What is Ibn Sirin's interpretation of hair loss in a dream?

preview.html: Hair loss in a dream for a single woman. Hair loss for girls is one of the things that makes the viewer feel afraid and psychologically tired in reality, and many girls care about everything related to their hair and work to take care of it. Interpretation scholars believe that seeing hair loss in a dream varies according to its appearance, whether it is abundant hair or light and colored, and in this article we consider together the most important things that have been said about this vision. Hair loss in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her hair is falling out, This means that she will fall into great distress and will be exposed to many health and financial misfortunes and crises. Hair loss in a girl’s dream also indicates many problems and pitfalls that she cannot overcome. If a girl sees in her dream that her hair is falling out, this means that she will not be able to Achieving her goals and ambitions. When a girl sees that her hair is falling out a lot and she cannot keep it, this tells her that she will have a lot of money and she will get it soon. If a girl who is studying at one stage sees that her hair is falling out a lot, this means that she is suffering from psychological and physical exhaustion. And tension and anxiety about her future at that time. For an unmarried girl to see that her hair is falling out in a dream and she does not regret or cry, it means that she will achieve many ambitions that she has been fighting for a long time. If the fortuneteller has curly hair and sees that it is falling out, this portends positive changes that will It will happen to her soon. If the fiancée sees in a dream that a lock of her hair is falling out, this means that she will separate from her fiancé and break up the relationship between them. Secrets of Dream InterpretationThe expert includes a team of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access, write a page on the Internet Secrets of Dream Interpretation on Google. Hair loss in the dream of an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing a single woman losing her hair in a dream and maintaining it means that she is characterized by good qualities and high morals. And if a girl sees that all the hair has fallen from her head and she has become bald, This means that she is distinguished by great intelligence. And if the dreamer sees that her hair is falling out and she is sad and crying over it, this leads to a big problem that she cannot face. And if the girl sees in a dream that her hair is falling to the ground, this means that she will not take advantage of the best opportunities and will lose them from her hands. If she sees The dreamer says that her dyed hair has fallen out, this portends her getting rid of problems and obstacles. When the dreamer sees her hair falling from her head, this symbolizes great suffering from lack of money and falling into severe hardship. Losing a woman’s hair in a dream can lead to getting rid of many worries. And the intense sadness that she suffered from. The loss of white hair in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates a lot of happy and good news for her and getting rid of the many problems that she suffers from. When the dreamer sees white hair falling from her head, this means that she will get rid of her friends.

title: Seeing a rooster in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a rooster in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that seeing a rooster in a man’s dream indicates a high position, but after he worked hard and tired in a small job then he got a promotion. Seeing a fat rooster in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s strength and perseverance to reach the realization of his dreams, desires and goals. Dreaming of a rooster entering the house is a sign of the good reputation of the people of the house. Dreaming of slaughtering a rooster in a dream portends goodness and relief from distress. Anyone who sees himself eating blood meat in a dream is a sign of feeling full of the wealth he has created and a life of extravagance and comfort. Seeing a rooster In a single woman's dream, seeing a rooster in a dream for a single girl symbolizes a man. She needs a man in her life to protect and preserve him. Who does she listen to? The rooster in a dream shows the approach of her marriage. A rooster in a dream for a single girl symbolizes a man. Whoever she sees. The red rooster color indicates her marriage to the young man she loves. On Although the black color indicates her marriage to a man she does not know. Seeing a white rooster is a sign of goodness and happiness and the dreamer’s marriage to a rich and respectable person. Seeing a rooster crowing in a dream for a married woman. A rooster in a married woman’s dream symbolizes her husband. If the white color indicates his love for her. Seeing a rooster in the fortuneteller’s bed It means birth. Seeing the slaughter of a rooster indicates marriage problems. Slaughtering a rooster for divorced or widowed women. It indicates the insight’s sadness for her ex-husband and her reluctance to marry again. Interpretation of seeing a rooster crowing in a dream for a pregnant woman. To see a rooster in a dream, the pregnant woman symbolizes the celebration of the newborn. The rooster in her dream symbolizes the newborn. New Memory. The meaning of seeing a rooster in a dream for a man. Seeing a rooster standing in front of the dreamer’s house indicates security in the home. A fat rooster shows the pride and dignity of God and his guardians. Seeing them selling roosters indicates postponing engagement, marriage, or travel. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it. And we explain it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about sunset and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about sunset The sun is one of the solar planets, it can rise from the east and can set from the west, the sun has many benefits for humans, the environment and life in general, the sun can be considered a source of life for many living organisms and plants on this earth, while countries where the sun does not rise suffer from many problems, on the other hand, countries where the sun rises are characterized by many crops and production. Interpretation of a dream about sunset It is known that the sun may rise from the east and set at sunset, but the interpretation of a dream about sunset can convey to the viewer many different interpretations of its interpretation, the most important of which are the following: Sunset can be considered a sign of a person losing his passion and hope in life. It should be noted that sunset has been interpreted by many interpreters as a sign of disappointment and despair suffered by the monarch. As for if the sunset is watered by the sea, this is evidence of an improvement in the social conditions of the seer and those around him. As the sunset from the sea, many people have the ability to face the difficulties in the life of the seer. But when a man sees the sunset, it is one of the signs of the prestigious job that he will get in the coming days, God willing I know. And the sunset also goes to the man, a sign of the abundance of money that he will get in the coming days. See also: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing cheating on the exam in a dream Interpretation of seeing the sunset and the appearance of the moon When the sun sets, the moon begins to appear, this process is consecutive Watching the sunset and the rising of the moon is one of the dreams that the dreamer may hide from many people, the most important of which are: - In this vision, many people came to the dreamer and she is one of the human beings who praise him. It is worth noting that many commentators interpreted the deviation of the moon and its appearance as a sign of the new beginning of my vision of a new life. While this vision is one of the signs of the high material improvement of the seer and abundant food. While when the appearance of many moons can be seen in a dream, this indicates the large amount that the dreamer will get in his next life, and God knows best. Sunset is also one of the signs that express many successes and distinction in the dreamer's life. Sunset is a sign of the end of worries and sorrows in the dreamer's life. It was also mentioned in the interpretation of sunset that it is one of the signs of renewing the dreamer's faith. While the sun is generally considered an undesirable person, and indicates the problems and disasters that It will happen. title: The most important interpretations of seeing the number 11 in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the number 11 in a dream: The appearance of numbers in a dream has many indicators and interpretations that differ from one number to another. Numbers are not limited to ordinary daily life as far as calculations are concerned, but they appear in many of our memories, so seeing them in a dream sometimes indicates personal relationships and can bring signs of the near future. Today, we are dealing with the interpretation of vision number 11 in particular and the clarification of all the messages that it conveys to the dreamer. What is the interpretation of dream number 11 in a dream? Some jurists mentioned that seeing this figure in a dream symbolizes physical and mental maturity and the strength of feelings and emotions. And if the dreamer is a creative person In the field of work and is always characterized by new, non-recurring ideas, this is a sign of an imminent promotion at work or an increase in income. This number also indicates that the current events are related to things that have passed before and that the visionary will put an end to those old problems that are disturbing his life in the current period and with something With patience and wisdom, he will be able to find radical solutions to them. It can indicate certain aspects that the viewer does not want anyone to know about, and here the vision takes on a psychological interpretation, meaning that he is hiding a secret that could negatively affect his relationship with someone close to him and his excessive thinking. About the consequences of revealing this secret, the matter was fixed in his subconscious, until this scene seemed to him a mysterious dream. Seeing the number 11 can convey to you a message to review your assumptions and rearrange your priorities to see what can be changed for the better and what can be avoided. In general, this number indicates achieving Desire or achieving a goal, it is an indication of the success that the fortuneteller will achieve in the coming period. Interpretation of the number 11 in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned a group of connotations symbolized by the number 11 in the dream, which range between the dreamer’s relationship with the Creator - the Almighty - and his relationship with others, and these can be clarified. The connotations are as follows: If the dreamer is one who is associated with prayer and night, then seeing this number is good news that his good deeds will be accepted, and his request will continue to be steadfast in obedience. The appearance of this number could be evidence that you are an unconventional person and do not like to be associated with the foundations of customs and traditions, so you are looking Always about renewal, but you must keep in mind that renewal without a goal or purpose can lead you down the wrong path, so make your first and last reference the word of God - Glory be to Him - and not human civilization. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that seeing the number written on the wall is A message to you that you are about to hear good and happy news that you have been waiting to hear for a while or that you are achieving a goal that you are working hard to achieve. Also, the number 11 indicates strength, intelligence, and high spiritual energy. We find that it also shows the love of friends and the strength of your relationship with them. You are a person who is good at negotiating with others, building strong relationships and always seeking their support. If the dreamer takes on an important position, he may be entrusted with something that seems difficult to him, but he can complete it successfully, and the appearance of this particular number in his dream confirms his ability to

title: The symbol of the appearance of horses in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Horse in a dream: The horse is considered one of the animals that indicate a number of good symbols, such as courage, generosity, nobility, and boldness. Morals and this famous position taken by the horse in the world of dreams, as his vision indicates many good things that will happen to the visionary, and the rest of the details related to seeing horses in a dream are mentioned in the following lines in the following article .. So follow us Horse in a dream If the dreamer sees horses in a dream, this means that the dreamer will give him a lot of money from a legitimate source with his help and goodness will always be his share. If the dreamer sees a horse, this is clear evidence that the dreamer will get many good and very dangerous things in his life and God will help him in his will and he will get the things he wanted before. When the dreamer sees that there is a group of horses running in front of him in a dream, this symbolizes the happy news that has circulated to him in the past few days, which made him feel satisfied and happy throughout his life. If the dreamer sees dead horses in his dream, this indicates the disasters and disturbances that he has recently fallen into, and this increased his feeling of sadness and anger from the depression he is currently living in. If the dreamer sees many horses in a dream while driving them, this is a good sign that the dreamer will reach a high position in his work and will be He has many workers under his responsibility and will lead them wisely and intelligently. . Horses in a dream by Ibn Sirin Among the sayings of Ibn Sirin is that seeing horses in a dream symbolizes the good that will happen to the dreamer in his life and the extent of the good and benefits that he will obtain in his world. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing horses running from afar in a dream indicates that there are many positive and good changes that will soon happen in the dreamer's dream, God willing. If the dreamer sees that he is riding a horse in a dream, this is a clear sign of the proximity of marriage, God willing, and that he will be happy with this marriage and it will be the beginning of beautiful days in his life. When a person sees in his dream that he is leading many horses and they completely surrender to him and carry out his orders, this symbolizes that the dreamer has great authority in his life and that he uses it well. If the dreamer sees that he is riding a flying horse with large wings, this symbolizes pride, honor and great glory that the dreamer will achieve in his life. Looking for Ibn Sirin's interpretations? title: Interpretation of a dream about a black spider by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A black spider in a dream. A spider is an insect that weaves threads from its saliva for itself, or it is considered a trap for small insects that it feeds on. There is a whole surah in the Holy Qur’an in the name of the spider. God Almighty said (The example of those who have taken guardians besides God is the example of a spider that has taken up a home These are the houses that look like a spider's house. If only they knew), and there is a famous miracle with the Prophet Muhammad in the cave, and when the dreamer sees a black spider in a dream, he is afraid of it and afraid of what he sees. Scientists believe that the vision has many interpretations, and in this article we look together at the most important things that have been said about this vision. Black spider in a dream If a married man sees a black spider in his dream, this means that his wife will betray him or that he will have some bad relationships. And the woman who sees The black spider in a dream, but she killed him, shows the many problems she faces, but she will face them until they end. If the dreamer sees in a dream a black spider building his nest over the bed of him and his wife, this leads to distance, separation, and flaming disputes between them. Behind me, the black spider in his class declares that he is a good man. He does good deeds to please his Lord. And if a young man commits a lot of sins and sees that he is killing a spider, this means that he will repent to God and stop what he is doing. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in the interpretation of dreams in the Arab world. Just write: A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google And get the correct interpretations. A black spider in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a black spider in a dream is one of the visions that does not bode well and is not good at all. It may express some of the bad qualities that the dreamer is known for. If the sleeper sees a spider making its nest in his home, this will lead to tragedies and extreme poverty that will befall him. A woman who dreams that a black spider is wrapping its threads in her home means that she will face many problems and perhaps financial or financial difficulties. She will be robbed. Seeing a black spider in a dream indicates the fears and sad news that will be found in the coming days. A black spider in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees a black spider in her dream means that she will face difficulties and problems in her life. Likewise, the dreamer who sees a spider Black in a dream means that she will cause him a lot of harm, but she will overcome it as a result of her perseverance and effort. And seeing a black spider girl while she is at home walking on her bed means that she will suffer from obstacles and misfortunes in her life. And the dreamer who sees that a black spider is chasing her means that she will be harmed by someone Close to her. If a girl sees herself cleaning and getting rid of cobwebs, this means that she will be blessed with marriage to a young man with high morals. Seeing cleaning the house and getting rid of cobwebs also indicates great success in professional life and ample food. A black spider in a dream for a married womanIf a woman sees Married black spider f

title: Interpretation of seeing receiving money in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream according to Ibn Sirin's interpretation, money is one of the goals of life that many people seek to acquire. In real life, it is related to some psychological effects that a person carries inside him, so in this article we will learn together today about the interpretation of seeing getting money in a dream according to Ibn Sirin's interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing money in a dream, Ibn Sirin's interpretation Ibn Sirin says that seeing someone taking money in a dream shows his closeness and love for this person. Seeing a dreamer taking a lot of money from people he does not know is evidence of the dreamer's hypocrisy with those around him and his deception. As for Al-Nabulsi, he sees that obtaining a piece of money is good news for the birth of a child, and in the case of obtaining a group of money, it can indicate illness and trouble. Interpretation of a dream about seeing money in a dream for a single woman A single woman who sees money in her dream shows that she is an ambitious girl seeking to achieve her dreams. This may indicate the confusion and tension she suffers from in her life, as well as her insecurity. An unmarried woman who takes money from someone she knows indicates her marriage to this person, but if this person is unknown, the dream may indicate marriage or obtaining money. Taking coins in a dream means that she will face problems with her relatives and friends. Interpretation of a dream about getting money in a dream for a married woman A married woman who takes money from her husband indicates pregnancy, and if it is silver, she will give birth to a female, but if the money is paper, it means that she will give birth to a boy, and God alone knows what is in it. He - she. Matrices If a married woman sees money in the street, this indicates that she has a good and loyal friend. The interpretation of seeing money in a dream for a married woman generally symbolizes her material need, and if she sees her face engraved on coins, this indicates the prosperity of her livelihood and the money she will get. Interpretation of a dream about seeing money in a dream for a pregnant woman The meanings of money in a dream for a pregnant woman differ according to the type of money she got. We show this in the following points: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is receiving coins, this is a sign that the birth will be difficult. The bill indicates an easy and easy birth, God willing. Coins are evidence of giving birth to females, while notes indicate giving birth to males. Interpretation of a dream about seeing money received from a living person in a dream Seeing that money is taken from someone close to the dreamer is evidence of mutual love and friendship between them, and if the bills are put forward, this person shares it and his cooperation will achieve great profits. Taking a lot of money from a person he does not know is evidence of his deception and hypocrisy with those around him, while taking a paper from him shows that his wife is pregnant and God knows best. Taking a lot of money from a person and the dreamer without it means that he will fall into trouble and refrain from charity and spending in the way of God. Interpretation of a dream about receiving banknotes in a dream Banknotes in a dream are good news and great power. They may indicate the
